meanings.definition: The layer of flooring directly beneath the finished floor covering.
meanings.sent1: The subfloors provide a sturdy base for the carpet.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the subfloors for any signs of damage before installing the new tiles.
meanings.sent3: The subfloors whispered secrets to the creaky floorboards above.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like the subfloors, hiding layers of memories beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The subfloors groaned under the weight of years of foot traffic.

meanings.definition: A floor or layer of flooring beneath the main floor.
meanings.sent1: The basement had damp subfloors that needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent2: The old house had beautiful hardwood subfloors hidden beneath the worn-out carpet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to hide under the subfloors and surprise unsuspecting visitors.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like the subfloors, always there but rarely noticed.
meanings.sent5: The subfloors held the history of the house within their wooden planks.
